name: AdaptiveKit
body:
# Welcome to AdaptiveKit
![Goby Fish](/images/adaptive/adaptive_goby_fish.png "Cool Fish!")

## About AdaptiveKit

Coming soon!

## Projects

### [ChromiumSharp](http://adaptivekit.github.com/adaptivekit-web-chromiumsharp/)

With ChromiumSharp you can easily leverage the power of HTML5 from within your .NET/Mono applications. Lovingly built on solid foundations so you can focus on your next masterpiece and not the tricky bits. Go to the ChromiumSharp [site](http://adaptivekit.github.com/adaptivekit-web-chromiumsharp/) or [repository](https://github.com/AdaptiveKit/adaptivekit-web-chromiumsharp) project repository.

## Authors & Contributors

[Carlos Lozano](@carloslozano) - Maintainer & Development Lead

## Legal Stuff

This project was initially created and is stewarded by [Carlos Lozano](https://github.com/carloslozano). Any comments, views, code and published content are the work and views of the respective authors and do not necessarily represent the views of their respective employers.

All trademarks and copyrights are the intellectual property of their respective contributors and owners. Any issues should be raised with the maintainer of the project.

## Contact, Support & Get Social

* Follow [Carlos Lozano](https://www.linkedin.com/in/clozano) on [github](@carloslozano) and [twitter](https://twitter.com/carloslozano).
* Follow the [AdaptiveKit](http://adaptivekit.github.com) project on [github](@AdaptiveKit) and [twitter](https://twitter.com/adaptivekit).
* Discuss cool stuff by joining the [AdaptiveKit Developers Group] (https://groups.google.com/d/forum/adaptivekit-developers) and [mailing list](mailto:adaptivekit-developers@googlegroups.com).
* Get answers or contribute by joining the [AdaptiveKit Group](https://groups.google.com/d/forum/adaptivekit) and [mailing list](mailto:adaptivekit@googlegroups.com).
